notes: Instantly kills summoned units.Slow lasts 4 seconds.
desc:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 25 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
